publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: brotherly affection, especially respectful affection for eldest brother
loving fondness, loving care, loving kindness
filial piety, devotion to one's living parents and dead forbears
commitment; devoted effort, duty of loyal devotion; trustiness; the doing of one's loyal best 臣德也。
disloyalty; rebelliousness [to be moved in under 倍/背]
public (often demonstrative) generosity (usually on a large scale); act of generosity MOVE TO GENEROUS NAB
callous lack of brotherly-care-like sympathy and concern
humble respectfulness, humility, humble politeness; polite correctness in behaviour
earnest and respectful diligence; respectful devotion

tls:text.tls:line: Words and actions embracing the One Unity is called morality.

sense.def: embrace the One (Primeval) Unity; be merged into one unity
truthfulness; reliability of one's attitude; credibiliy; trustiness as a psychological virtue involving action in good faith; faithful allegiance
credibility; trustworthiness, good faith, dependability, reliability
impeccable ritual purity and propriety in action
moral integrity, integrity; (one's example of) moral impeccability
moral integrity, integrity; (one's example of) moral impeccability
pursuit of private interests, private aims; selfish purposes; private selfishness; egotism
fair empathy for others; non-discriminating considerateness; mindfulness of the concerns of others
natural potential; (potential) power; the natural potential/power that something has by virtue of being in accordance with the Way
humaneness, kind empathy; kindliness, kind-heartedness; benevolence, Goodness as a moral value
what is right; duty, as in 吾義 "my duty"
harmony; natural balance; cohesion; harmonious internal relations
diligence; preoccupation with which one is carefully or warily concerned; moral carefulness
understanding; level of understanding (possibly needs to be read in the fourth tone in this meaning)
ritual propriety, the rules and principles of ritual propriety; the demands of ritual
N1=scope of superlative: 士之仁者 of the gentlemen the (most!) human-hearted" of the N1 the most N2
one thing; one unit; 此一 "this one thing"

seg.line: 故夫言者善則謂之智矣

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故夫言者善則謂之智矣
